title: Design Won’t Save Us — But We Need It: Inside the Triennale di Milano’s Blockbuster Exhibition, “Inequalities”
description: Curated by an all-star cast, "Inequalities" examines what design can tell us about social and economic inequality in the 21st century. The post Design Won’t Save Us — But We Need It: Inside the Triennale di Milano’s Blockbuster Exhibition, “Inequalities” appeared first on Journal.
author: Pat Finn
